description: This source file defines authentication API endpoints using Flask and Flask-Smorest, including user registration (/signup), login (/login), and retrieving current user info (/me). It handles HTTP requests, interacts with the database, and utilizes schemas and authentication utilities.

classes.name: SignUp
classes.description: Endpoint for user registration, handling POST requests to create new users.

classes.name: Login
classes.description: Endpoint for user login, authenticates users and issues tokens.

classes.name: Me
classes.description: Endpoint to retrieve current authenticated user's info.

methods.name: post(self, email: str, password: str)
methods.description: Handles user registration by creating a new User, saving it to the database, and returning a token.

methods.name: post
methods.description: Handles user login by verifying credentials and returning a token.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Returns info about the current authenticated user.

ctags.name: post
ctags.pattern: /^    def post(self, email: str, password: str):$/

ctags.name: post
ctags.pattern: /^    def post(self, email: str, password: str):$/
